The '''Forbidden Individual Curse Tag''' is a [[juinjutsu]] utilised by [[Madara Uchiha]].

== Usage ==
The cursed seal is placed directly on the target's heart and by design, prevents the branded individual from taking their own lives or removing the cursed seal themselves. A direct strike to the heart appears to be able to remove the seal — albeit risking one's life in the process. According to [[Obito Uchiha]], the cursed seal also interfered with him becoming the [[Ten-Tails]]' [[jinchūriki]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 675, pages 5-7</ref>

== Trivia ==
* Both [[Rin Nohara]] and Obito Uchiha, who were branded with this cursed seal, had it removed by [[Kakashi Hatake]]'s [[Chidori]] and [[Lightning Cutter]] respectively, although Rin died while Obito survived by [[Six Paths Ten-Tails Coffin Seal|sealing]] the Ten-Tails into himself shortly after.
* In the manga, the tag is black, with a [[Rinnegan]]-like symbol on it, while in the anime, it is white, with a red, white, and teal symbol.
* While this seal prevented Obito from becoming a jinchūriki of the Ten-Tails, no such hindrance existed for Rin becoming one for [[Isobu]].
